programme.title: Keliatan Banget Nyenggol Hati King Dosen
programme.desc: As Galang passed by, a man ran past him in the same jacket. A few moments later, someone came after Erin's purse snatcher. Galang was almost beaten by the mob. Galang was accused of having taken Erin's wallet. Finally Galang was able to survive and was free from accusations. Erin searched for a home address and managed to meet and introduced herself as Johan's daughter. It turns out that Erin has been looking for her family all this time.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta - EP 321
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Pol PP Cantik Galaknya Bikin Candu
programme.desc: Dimas (Kenny Austin) is caught in a raid by Intan (Yuriska Patricia) who thinks Dimas is a busker. It turns out that Dimas is not an ordinary busker, but the future son-in-law of Burhan, Intan's commander.

programme.title: ETHIRNEECHAL THODARGIRADHU
programme.desc: Urged by her father, Janani is always a high achiever. But her marriage into a patriarchal family dashes her dream of a career. Thus begins Janani's arduous journey towards empowering her family's oppressed women to unleash their power.

programme.title: Sevvanthi
programme.desc: Destiny plays a cruel role in Sevanthi's naive and sheltered life with her dream-come-true husband Mano and his extended family. Watch Sevanthi traverse the nuances of family, despite the challenges life throws at her.

programme.title: Poongodi
programme.desc: Poongodi rises above her father's male chauvinism, intent on proving herself & pursuing a college education. Her path crosses with Saravanan, a naïve young man who blindly trusts his manipulative stepmother. Uncover the fate of the two kindred souls.

programme.title: Punitha
programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI
programme.desc: When her husband, a soldier, disappears in a military accident, Vinothini never loses hope, firmly believing he'll come back. Join her inspiring journey as she cares for his family & meets life's hardships as a single mother with resilience & love

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM
programme.desc: Raised as a single child, Selvi longs for the loving embrace & heart-warming bond of a joint family. And when her dream comes true, watch her battle all odds & win over her husband's large family.

programme.desc: Maha, her family’s financial backbone, marries Selvam, on condition that she will continue to support her family financially even after marriage. Post which they confront challenges that put the family’s peace and happiness to test.

programme.title: Movie - Maapla Singam - EP 1
programme.desc: A leader's daughter falls in love with a boy from the rival caste. Things take a turn when her cousin Anbu falls in love with the boy's sister.

programme.title: Movie - Mirchi Masala - EP 1
programme.desc: A woman decides to fight against her powerful oppressor. When the guard of a chilli factory helps her, the women and the teacher of the village join them to openly defy the prevailing repression.

programme.title: Movie - Vadacurry - EP 1
programme.desc: Sathish, who is ashamed of his cheap phone, gives in to temptation when he finds one lying unattended in a shop and steals it. Unfortunately for him, the phone belongs to someone dangerous.

programme.title: Movie - Oru Kanniyum Moondru Kalavanigalum - EP 1
programme.desc: Lord Shiva illustrates to Tamil the significance of time in one's life by narrating a scenario where his girlfriend is kidnapped at different time intervals.

programme.title: Movie - Amigoes - EP 1
programme.desc: Three nearly-identical men become fast friends after meeting via an online doppelgänger-finding app. It's all fun and games until one of them turns out to be a notorious fugitive.

programme.title: Movie - Captain - EP 1
programme.desc: Gangster Soori, known as Captain, aids people in need. Meeting Nisha brings transformative love. Will his past hinder a new beginning?

programme.title: Movie - Thalaivi - EP 1
programme.desc: J Jayalalithaa, a prolific actress, is encouraged by her mentor, M G Ramachandran, to join politics. However, she faces a difficult challenge in the form of a male-dominated political environment.

programme.title: Movie - Vallamai Tharayao - EP 1
programme.desc: The sensitive portrayal of a woman torn between her relationships, feelings and desires.

programme.title: Movie - Bhairavakottai - EP 1
programme.desc: Basava and John, in a heist gone wrong, stumble upon mysteries in Bhairavakona, unraveling its secrets with Geetha's help.

programme.title: Movie - Saaho - EP 1
programme.desc: An undercover agent and his partner pursue a thief who stole 2,000 crore rupees, only to discover the case is connected to a crime lord's death and a brewing gang war.

programme.title: Movie - Kadugu - EP 1
programme.desc: A man goes up against corrupt and powerful people to avenge the crime committed against a child.

programme.title: Movie - Uthamma Villain - EP 1
programme.desc: Manoranjan, a superstar, is counting his last days due to brain tumor. How he goes about his final wish of doing a comedy film with his mentor Margadarsi forms the crux of the story.

programme.title: Movie - Raja Ranguski - EP 1
programme.desc: A police constable becomes the prime suspect in the murder of a woman. With the mysterious killer intent on making him the scapegoat, can he clear his name?

programme.title: Movie - House Owner - EP 1
programme.desc: Elderly couple Vasu and Radha, deeply in love, struggle when Vasu, a former army officer, is diagnosed with Alzheimer's, forcing Radha to cope with his changing behavior.

programme.title: Movie - Jadaa - EP 1
programme.desc: Jada, a rising football star, abandons his ambitions to join a violent local tournament and avenge the death of his hero, Sethu.

programme.title: Movie - Poovizhi Vasalile - EP 1
programme.desc: A man, depressed by the death of his family, adopts a boy with hearing and speech difficulty and names him after his dead son. The boy, who has seen the killers of his widowed mother, is in danger.

programme.title: Movie - Zombie Reddy - EP 1
programme.desc: Mario, a game developer, and his friends, get caught up in the rivalry between two families and a mysterious zombie attack in Rayalaseema where they go to attend a friend's wedding

programme.title: Movie - Pattathu Yaanai - EP 1
programme.desc: Saravanan and his friends come to Trichy to set up a new restaurant business. However, their plans get interrupted when he gets an order from a local gangster but falls for his girlfriend, Aishwarya.

programme.title: Movie - Theerkatharisi - EP 1
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger repeatedly calls the police control room, tipping them off about impending crimes and accidents.

programme.title: Movie - Sowkarpettai - EP 1
programme.desc: Driven by vengeance, spectral lovers return from the afterlife to haunt and punish the villains responsible for their untimely demise in a spectral reckoning.

programme.title: Movie - Thiruttu Payale 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, under orders from a senior official, records conversations of elite professionals. While on duty, he discovers an online sociopath and decides to reveal his identity.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Une Pierre Dans La Bouche
programme.desc: Injured, exhausted and on the run from two killers, an American gangster finds refuge in an isolated and apparently uninhabited manor. He soon discovers that it's actually occupied by a former actor, blind but with particularly keen instincts. One day the fugitive's nephew suddenly arrives, accompanied by his girlfriend...

programme.title: 2 Ou 3 Choses Que Je Ne Sais Pas D'elle
programme.desc: At 18, Lila has decided to wear the Muslim headscarf, much to the dismay of her family who have gathered to celebrate Eid. But, after an argument with her boyfriend she is in a resolutely bad mood and decides to slip away.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 7
programme.desc: Cecil Bazin, zoo director, is found dead in the cheetah enclosure. Despite the bite marks, it wasn't a cheetah that killed her. Had someone wanted to make it look like an accident by letting one of the big cats into the enclosure when it should have spent the night indoors?

programme.title: Tandem - EP 8
programme.desc: Fishermen surprise Julien, Alice's boyfriend, cleaning-up a crime scene at the port. Everything points to him as the one who killed his friend Mickael. Lea tries desperately to get Julien to explain, but he refuses to say anything. Why would he have attacked someone he considered as a brother?

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes - EP 17
programme.desc: Rising sea-levels are one of the consequences of climate change that will change the map of the world. Different countries are trying to adapt, using varied strategies. From Shanghai to Tuvalu, from megacities to tiny islands, we visit some of the most vulnerable coastlines and the solutions they have invented.

programme.title: Meurtres A Meaux
programme.desc: A man is murdered during a reenactment of the Battle of the Marne organised by him. Lieutenant Karine Lelievre and Captain Isabelle Guercher are tasked with the investigation. Unfortunately, they are sworn enemies... The case gets more complicated when they discover that the murder is linked to their shared past.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 9
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. programme.title: Movie - Natpe Thunai
programme.desc: Prabhakaran, a former hockey player, helps a local team save their ground by training them to win a match against the Pondicherry team. However, a corrupt politician has his eyes set on the ground.

programme.title: Movie - Vattaram
programme.desc: A man has nursed the ambition to become a don like his idol. He bids his time until he gets a chance to join his idol's gang and quickly becomes an important henchman. He is trusted against the warnings of his lieutenant.

programme.title: Movie - Galatta Ganapathy
programme.desc: A man gets married to a woman but when he brings her home, his mother demands dowry from her. Things take a turn when he learns that she is a sub-inspector.

programme.title: Movie - Padhavi Paduthum Paadu
programme.desc: A political satire based on a forest bandit and a sandalwood smuggler with a difference. The bandit gets amnesty and enters politics to clean up the corrupt system.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Maharaja
programme.desc: Bored by his monotonous lifestyle, Mahadevan, a middle-aged family man, longs to live a modern life. However, everything begins to fall apart when he chooses to change his way of living.

programme.title: Movie - Subash
programme.desc: In order to marry the girl he loves, Subash, a good-for-nothing youth, joins the army. When he returns, he learns that his own brother is using corrupt ways to gain power in politics.

programme.title: Movie - Enn Purusan Kuzhantai Mathuri
programme.desc: A man gets involved with another woman just a day before he is to get married. After marriage, he lands in trouble when he confesses his mistake to his wife.

programme.title: Movie - Mahanadhi
programme.desc: Krishnaswamy, an honest man, is conned into a chit fund business and imprisoned. While he faces unspeakable hardships in prison, his family disintegrates.

programme.title: Movie - Kaththi Sandai
programme.desc: Arjun plays modern-day Robin Hood when he steals money from two corrupt government officials and uses it to develop the remote village he hails from.

programme.title: Movie - Evano Oruvan
programme.desc: Sridhar has to deal with widespread corruption in all walks of life. A stray incident triggers inside him a reaction that may cost him more than the two rupees he initially tries to protest against.

programme.title: Movie - Killadi Mappillai
programme.desc: Rajaram rejects the girl chosen by his father since he loves Shanthi. However, he must first take up the herculean task of impressing Shanthi's parents so that they will permit him to marry her.

programme.title: Movie - Uyarnthavan
programme.desc: This film is directed by Ashokram, and stars Ramki and Shanthipriya in the lead roles, with music by Gangai Amaran.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Kannukku Kannaga
programme.desc: Devi is afraid to tell her brother that she loves Arun. On learning about their relationship, he agrees to the marriage, but an astrologer predicts that he will die if Devi gives birth to a male child.

programme.title: Movie - Kilinjalgal
programme.desc: Babu's friend Jana helps him woo a girl not knowing that she is Julie, the same girl he himself loves. All goes well, until Julie's family disapproves of Babu and fixes her marriage with James.

programme.title: Movie - Deiva Vaakku
programme.desc: Hamsaveni's divine power earns her respect among the villagers, whereas her brother Vallatharai tries to exploit her power for his personal gain. He goes to the extent of sabotaging her marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Sudhanthiram
programme.desc: Two brothers, who always look out for each other, start working for a gangster after their father's death. But both of them get into a conflict when the younger one decides to testify against the gangster for a murder he committed.

programme.title: Movie - Iruttu
programme.desc: A police officer investigates the mystery behind unnatural deaths after taking charge of his new post at a hill station.

programme.title: Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers 2025 Group C: Slovakia vs Denmark
programme.desc: The 2025 Billie Jean King Cup Qualifiers are being played as 6 groups of 3 nations as the Billie Jean King Cup Finals transit from a 12-team event to an 8 team event in 2025, mirroring the existing Davis Cup Final 8 format. Each 3 day qualifiers group event will be held in one location and played on a round-robin basis. The 6 group winners will join hosts China, and 2024 world champions Italy in the 2025 Finals in Shenzhen.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Queen’s Club in London plays host to the HSBC Championships - with the tour returning to the annual tournament at the WTA 500-level after more than 50 years. programme.title: Halo World Snooker C'ship 2025: R2-20 (Si Jiahui vs Ben Woolaston)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 8
programme.desc: Join Togo and African football icon Emmanuel Adebayor as he relives his top 10 Premier League moments. From iconic goals to unforgettable rivalries, this inspiring and entertaining show is packed with candid insights, untold stories, and the passion that defined his career.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 20
programme.desc: PL Stories looks into the extraordinary journey of Emmanuel Adebayor, from his prolific Premier League career with Arsenal, Manchester City, Tottenham, and Crystal Palace, to the harrowing experience of surviving the Togo bus attack in 2010. We dive deep into his rise as one of Africa's finest football talents, and how the near-death tragedy profoundly impacted his life, shaping his resilience and outlook beyond the game.

programme.desc: Highlights from all the fixtures from Matchweek 5 of the Premier League. Arsenal travel to Manchester City in a huge match at The Etihad, as well as a London derby as West Ham host Chelsea.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 8
programme.desc: We delve into the careers of some of the most enigmatic and unpredictable footballers to have graced the English top-flight in recent years and find out how they became 'Premier League mavericks'. We get under the skin of what made these players notorious, controversial and flamboyant and the impact they had in their time in England.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 20
programme.desc: This week's Big Interview sees two of Chelsea's biggest stars from different generations come together for a football masterclass. Considered one of the most technically gifted players the Premier League has ever seen, Gianfranco Zola visits the Chelsea training ground to talk to the man currently lighting up the Premier League, Cole Palmer, about various aspects of his game.

programme.desc: From free kicks to bicycle kicks, relive some of the most memorable strikes from 2024/25 in a Premier League season.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 50
programme.desc: We follow New Zealand striker Chris Wood during a crucial World Cup Qualifier on home soil, at the peak of one of the most impressive seasons of his career. Back in his hometown, we meet the family, coaches and friends who helped shape the player and the person he's become. From humble beginnings to Premier League mainstay, Wood reflects on the pressures he's faced, the pride of leading his country, and the mindset that's driven him every step of the way.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 21
programme.desc: Before stepping into the dugout, Martin O'Neill was part of one of football's most iconic teams with Brian Clough's Nottingham Forest. Hear from Martin as he shares stories from his remarkable journey across nearly five decades in the game. From European heartbreak, to promotional triumph, discover what shaped his extraordinary career, both on the field and from the sidelines.

programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 16
programme.desc: Kaoru Mitoma's football talent was evident from a young age in Japan, but when a professional opportunity came, he made the unexpected choice that left many surprised. This episode unravels the unique path that took Mitoma from university to the Premier League, where he's now making his mark on the world's toughest football stage.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 6
programme.desc: Nicknamed 'The Entertainers', Kevin Keegan's Newcastle team of the 1995-96 season set the Premier League alight with their confidence and flair that took them agonisingly close to winning their first Premier League title. In this show, we speak to those that were part of that incredible journey and reflect on some of those unforgettable moments that captured hearts and forever changing the club's legacy.

programme.title: PL MASTERCLASS - EP 4
programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Brennan Johnson, Matheus Cunha, Bernd Leno, Diogo Dalot and Ipswich Town goals recreated.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 5
programme.desc: Premier League legend Tim Howard takes on the ultimate challenge, ranking the 10 greatest US players to play in the Premier League. But there's a twist; from his carefully selected list, he must crown one as the Ultimate Premier League USA GOAT.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 41
programme.desc: A relationship steeped in glory, Chelsea Football Club is the Italian Job. Last summer, Enzo Maresca became the seventh manager from that heritage to take charge at Stamford Bridge. PL Stories looks back at the success shared between the club and managers from Italy, while also delving into Maresca's own unique coaching journey as he strives to emulate the achievements of those who came before him.

programme.title: 1-TO-11 - EP 2
programme.desc: Former Chelsea and Tottenham midfielder Gus Poyet chooses the best eleven teammates he shared a Premier League pitch with.

programme.desc: Each Premier League game from the 2024/25 season condensed into an individual 26-minute highlights show.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 1
programme.desc: We catch up with Juan Mata in Australia, where the former Premier League star is now playing with Western Sydney Wanderers. The Spaniard reflects on his memorable years in England with Chelsea and Manchester United, sharing insights into his greatest moments, personal growth, and connection with fans. As he begins a new chapter down under, he also opens up about life after the Premier League and what lies ahead both on and off the pitch.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 5
programme.desc: Premier League legend Tim Howard takes on the ultimate challenge, ranking the 10 greatest US players to play in the Premier League. But there's a twist; from his carefully selected list, he must crown one as the Ultimate Premier League USA GOAT.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 39
programme.desc: The Premier League is seeing a big boost in popularity amongst the Black American population and we travelled Stateside to learn more about this growing appeal. The show is led by Aaron Dolores, football fan and founder of Black Arrow, a creative movement on a quest to promote the intersection of football and black culture, not just in the US but worldwide.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 48
programme.desc: Reggae Rhythms in the Premier League explores the powerful connection between Jamaica and the world's most-watched football league, showcasing how the island's culture, music, and style have influenced the Premier League. We feature iconic Jamaican players who have left their mark, while also diving into the impact of reggae music, fashion, and fan culture on the game.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Ola Afolabi I
programme.desc: We look back to the beginning of the historic years-long rivalry between Marco Huck and Ola Afolabi, which began in Ludwigsburg, Germany with Huck putting his WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line for the first time. The result would be a closely fought, all-action contest that would lead to three more meetings between the two cruiserweights for years to come. Don't miss the kick off to the Huck vs. Afolabi rivalry for the WBO Cruiserweight World Title on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Shane Mosley vs. Manuel Gomez
programme.desc: In this episode, the newly crowned IBF Lightweight World Champion, Shane Mosley, makes the first defense of the title he claimed from Phillip Holiday just three months earlier. He would face a tough competitor in Manuel Gomez of Laredo, Mexico, who would give the new champion a difficult test.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Saul (Canelo) Alvarez vs. Shane Mosley
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-unbeaten Saul "Canelo" Alvarez in what might yet be his toughest challenge in his career, as he defends the WBC light middleweight championship against "Sugar" Shane Mosley. Also on the card, action from former light heavyweight champ Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 4, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Okinoumi, Hoshoryu and Onosho.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, Jr. defeating Juan Manuel Marquez for career win No. 40, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.desc: This episode features Floyd Mayweather, Jr. defeating Juan Manuel Marquez for career win No. 40, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Dina Thorslund vs. April Adams
programme.desc: WBO Super Bantamweight World Champion Dina Thorslund brings her undefeated record into a defense of her title against Australian April Adams, from the Forum in Thorslun's home of Denmark. Thorslund arrives with a record of 13-0, including a near-shutout decision victory over Jessica Munoz less than a year earlier to claim the World Championship. Adams has won seven fights in a row, climbing into the top 10 rankings and title contention.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Sergio Martinez vs. Matthew Macklin
programme.desc: This episode features an undisputed middleweight title fight between Sergio Martinez and Matthew Macklin, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Tbilisi, Georgia, where judo is one of the most popular sports in the country.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Keith Thurman vs Orlando Lora
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is the undefeated Keith Thurman facing off with Orlando Lora. A left hook and right uppercut combination ends this fight. Also on the card, action from former heavyweight champion James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5, from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan, features Asanoyama, Daieisho, Terunofuji and Shodai.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Manny Pacquiao vs. Oscar De La Hoya

programme.title: Introducing:
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS Presents 'Introducing:', a new original documentary series that covers the current stars of today and rising stars of tomorrow. Each episode we get an up close and personal perspective of their lives and see what drives them to be the best at what they do. Introducing: Caitlin Dechelle, provides an intimate look at one of the most dominant women in the history of martial arts tournaments.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 101
programme.desc: The Teletubbies bottom bounce on The Tubby Bouncy before wiggling their bottoms to a special bottom bump song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 7
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'g', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We rock out on the guitar, meet a goat and score a goal!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 52
programme.desc: On today's poptastic adventure, Plom finds a very special singing bug. But when the bug disappears,can the friends create their own songs so the bugs can sing along?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: When the Cloudship malfunctions and soars off into OKIDO, it's up to Messy and friends to return it to its natural habitat!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 35
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo want Dad all to themselves and will not let Mum have a smoochy kiss. They try to hide him all around the house, but Mum is desperate to spend a little romance time with her husband.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 34
programme.desc: Mackenzie, Jack and Rusty are playing as astronauts on a mission to Mars, but during their journey, Mackenzie keeps going missing and no one knows why, not even Mackenzie.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Meet Duggee, a big lovable dog who runs 'The Squirrel Club'; an activity club for pre-schoolers that inspires children to have fun, be energetic, and - most of all - to do things!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Meet Duggee, a big lovable dog who runs 'The Squirrel Club'; an activity club for pre-schoolers that inspires children to have fun, be energetic, and - most of all - to do things!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 25
programme.desc: At school, Bluey and her friends turn a tree stump into a thrilling game of Helicopter. But as the pilot, Bluey has to learn to give up some control, so they can all have fun.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 24
programme.desc: While Mum and Dad struggle to build new flat-pack furniture, Bluey and Bingo transform the empty boxes into their own new world.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Andy heads to the coast of Southern Japan in search of a mudskipper that can help him.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Charli loses her phone at the toy shop. Can Tinks' super-fetch skills help her find it?

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: Aneeshwar and Lizzie head out to meet lions. From their safari truck, they get right in amongst the pride and see big maned males as well as a large group of females. Their next animal is Rico, a two-toed sloth.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 23
programme.desc: In this episode Seaweed is missing his family, so Sandy organises a 'Boom' video call with his (and Captain Captain's) unusual relatives.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 1
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels meet a lion with unfortunate breath.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 52
programme.desc: When Mole was young he wanted to be a Stunt Mole! Can Duggee and the squirrels help?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S2) - EP 51
programme.desc: Duggee's uniform is a bit old and needs to be updated. Duggee can make his own clothes!!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Glitch creates trouble with a little pyramid when he and the Go Jetters visit the Pyramids of Giza in Egypt.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Four adventure-seeking superheroes explore places all around the world. The Go Jetters try to fix the Eiffel tower after Grandmaster Glitch breaks it while using it as a TV aerial.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 19
programme.desc: After Thomas loses his voice, he must find a new way to pass on a very important message.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 34
programme.desc: After Sarah helps Scarf Lady prepare the wool for her new roof, she settles down for a dreamy sleep.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 33
programme.desc: The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: Amare asks Stanley to help her on the farm. Stanley asks Little Woo, Fred and Fifi to join him in sowing seeds, watering plants and picking apples, all whilst having fun.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 12
programme.desc: Stanley covers Jose at the shop and ends up making too much popcorn. So as not to waste it all, Stanley and his friends put on a film night to screen Little Woo's film.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 68
programme.desc: Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: After going strawberry picking at the strawberry farm, JoJo and Gran Gran have lots of strawberries left over. So they decide to make delicious jam to preserve the berries for longer.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 31
programme.desc: When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.desc: A 92-year-old woman tells investigators why she shot and killed her 72-year-old son; a detective tells a suspect that the man he’s accused of stabbing has died at the hospital; and more.

programme.title: Australia's Sleep Revolution with Michael Mosley (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Dr Michael Mosley travels to Australia to enlist in a world-first, two-month sleep treatment program at the Flinders University Sleep Institute.

programme.title: One Cup: A Thousand Stories (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: A lone monk is on his life's mission to recreate the tea cakes of famous sage Lu Yu from the early Tang Dynasty. In an austere nunnery near Wuhan, the nuns experience every stage of tea-making - from picking all the way through to drinking - as an act of prayerful meditation.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: Earth (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: See how plant life turned Earth from a barren rock into a vibrant green world.

programme.title: Michael Palin - Into Iraq (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Michael continues his journey into the heart of Iraq on his way to Baghdad, and arrives in Kirkuk and the exact spot where the British discovered oil in 1927, when they also ruled the country. The next day, Michael heads towards Tikrit, Saddam Hussein's hometown. Having been stopped at several military checkpoints along the way, but is surprised when he receives a warm welcome from the local commander and coins it 'Checkpoint Cheerful'.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia S1 - EP 1
programme.desc: The end of WW2 marks the beginning of radical transformations to Australia's housing landscape - social, cultural and architectural history is about to unfold in ways never before seen on this vast continent.

programme.title: Heywire (2023) - EP 7
programme.desc: Heywire winner and cricket sensation Abby is developing the game for other up and coming girls living in rural and regional Australia.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: In two inspiring transformations, a couple turn a simple pavilion house on Sydney's northern beaches into a stylish pad filled with bespoke marble furniture and, in Melbourne, a family creates a flamboyant forever bathroom.

programme.title: The Quiet Man

He is confronted by strict local customs and the woman's belligerent brother. Set in the verdant Irish countryside, this lively film has beautiful scenery, brilliant repartee, and local charm.

programme.title: The Lion In Winter
programme.desc: To find a successor, King Henry II summons to court his three sons and wife, who he has kept imprisoned for the last 10 years. The powerfully destructive relationship of the family erupts as they scheme and cajole to determine who will be the future king.

programme.title: Sabrina (1954)
programme.desc: The chauffeur for a wealthy family sends his mousey daughter to Paris to broaden her horizons and help overcome her longtime crush on the family's playboy son. She returns an attractive young woman and wins the attention of the playboy son AND his more serious older brother.

programme.title: Paycheck

Now, he'll have to hit the books, instead of his bank account - or go back to being the world's wealthiest dropout!

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime

programme.title: Europe Early Edition

programme.title: Us Squawk On The Street
programme.desc: Headquartered live on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) where the biggest companies in the world trade, "Squawk On The Street" tracks the action of every stock and gives you access to the treasury, currency and commodity action in real time. The show also covers the final hour of European trading, providing investors with actionable insight on the best course of action to take in U.S. based markets.

programme.desc: Emily goes inside Stargate, an historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI. She speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman & Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their hopes for the project.

programme.title: The Circuit with Emily Chang S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: Emily goes inside Stargate, an historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI. She speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman & Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their hopes for the project.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets AMD CEO Lisa Su on the heels of her 10-year anniversary as CEO at the chipmaker's labs in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Artificial intelligence has begun to exhibit early signs of agency. Are we on a path to superintelligence? Self destruction? Or is the potential promise and threat of AI being overblown?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Bioacoustics technology and AI are revealing how animals communicate, and may soon allow us to talk to them ourselves. What can we learn from wildlife? And should we be talking to the animals at all?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: With the promise of unimaginable computing power, a global race for quantum supremacy is raging. Who will be first to harness this new technological force, and what will they do with it?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Water. Our survival depends on water, yet global reserves are rapidly shrinking. Can technology help secure humanity's future water needs?

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: For some, pain is excruciating and inescapable. But amid the continuing fallout of the opioid crisis, new technologies are being developed to limit and even eliminate pain.

programme.title: The Future with Hannah Fry S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Soon, another billion people will be online. How will these new users embrace this technology to transform their lives, and what will it mean for the rest of the world?

programme.title: The Growing Toll of America's Booming Kratom Industry
programme.desc: In this Bloomberg Originals documentary, we reveal how the unregulated substance is being promoted and even made more potent, and how some users are ending up dead.

programme.title: How India's Narendra Modi Took Power
programme.desc: Narendra Modi, India's prime minister, is both highly popular and deeply polarizing. How did he get to the top of Indian politics, and what do his policies mean for the country's future?

programme.title: Sex-for-Work Claims in West Africa's Rubber Industry
programme.desc: An activist seeking to address the alleged abuses contends she has been targeted with litigation to keep her quiet, which the company denied.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: PFAS chemicals are used in thousands of products aimed at making life easier. But the chemicals are now almost everywhere, including in human blood, and are being linked to severe health problems.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: In 2021, Agnes Tirop broke the women's 10,000 meter world record. Five weeks later, she was dead. We examine her murder and the threat of violence for other Kenyan runners.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The demand for human eggs is booming, giving rise to a largely unregulated and dangerous marketplace. In India, we meet a teenage girl caught up in this fertility underworld.

programme.title: The Deal with Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly S3 - EP 4

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Autoday
programme.desc: Automotive Program that discusses old cars from specs to storiesbehind the car. Also displays information about the car that is discussed the details of the device from home and abroad. Plus the public voxpop about the car being discussed. Packed in interesting themes.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S1
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S1
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: Sea Today Business (Live)
programme.desc: SEA Today Business delivers up to-date news and live reports about global stock markets.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)
programme.desc: 2 Hour News Show is one of our flagship programs which airs daily 3 - 5 PM, this program have a CEO Talk segment where the guest star is the CEO of various reputable companies.

programme.title: The Shelter
programme.desc: Documentary series about the lives of rescue animals in animal shelters. The sad and dark stories of animals that have to end up in shelters, the struggles of protectors of abandoned animals, the behavior of animals that are sometimes funny and sometimes chaotic, to the happy stories of those who finally have new homes and parents.

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. Indonesia is home to many endemic species, and the existence of these endemic species is very important and part of our identity, as all creatures play an important role in maintaining the balance of Indonesia's wild ecosystems.

programme.title: The Animal Library
programme.desc: A program about animals. Not only about pets, but also discuss about the types of care, and also the costs incurred as well as the uniqueness.

programme.title: K9 Mounties
programme.desc: When the Royal Canadian Mountain Police Force are in search of a missing person they call in the help of an elite group. The K9 Mounties are rigorously trained to be able to locate those in need in the hardest to reach places.

programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: Sport's Tale
programme.desc: Apart from being competitive, there are still many unique stories behind sports. The philosophy of sports club logos, to how much money is needed for a racing event, is discussed in this program.

programme.title: Beyond The Limit S2
programme.desc: Stories of young people who have pursued their dreams from an early age.

programme.title: Why We Ride
programme.desc: Inspired by Audax Indonesia, this program uncovers the unique story and feelings of participant from 200 km to 600 km ride. Starting form the beginning ride, obstacles founded in the road, to the relieved feeling when arriving at the final point.

programme.title: Autoday
programme.desc: Automotive Program that discusses old cars from specs to storiesbehind the car. Also displays information about the car that is discussed the details of the device from home and abroad. Plus the public voxpop about the car being discussed. Packed in interesting themes.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Night Guard S1
programme.desc: A family run business, Night Guard is a private security firm operating in Johannesburg, South Africa, where a violent crime happens every 16 seconds. Night Guard serves the people of Johannesburg by taking on the jobs that the police can't.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Discover London S2
programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment "Global Debate".

The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.desc: In a society that puts the spotlight on the smart guys only, there are people who do not have a grain of common sense. In this knowledge-talk show, these problematic people get locked up in a rooftop house and are allowed to go home only if they get 10 questions right.

programme.title: The Seasons W
programme.desc: When the end of one week meets the start of another week, this show will bring you music and stories that soothe your worries and concerns.

programme.title: Stars' Top Recipe at Fun-Staurant - EP 273
programme.desc: Gourmet celebrities team up to explore the world of convenience stores and share their secret recipes!

programme.desc: The host leads the guests to challenge the game. The game is fun and full of wits. The good guys and spies fight for the prize money, and the suspenseful atmosphere brings the audience a new and different experience!

programme.title: Hello Doctor - EP 1656
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 518
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: Dee Girls Talk - EP 281
programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.desc: More professional, richer, and more diversified car model information is shared with the audience.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1049
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. programme.title: Taxi Driver - EP 1
programme.desc: Ha Na is assigned to assist Sung Cheol on a support foundation for crime victims. Do Ki reaches out to help an orphan who is abused by her abductors.

programme.title: Small Swallow Xiaoyan Night

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1969
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Golden City - EP 641
programme.desc: Set in the 60s in Jioufen, the story tells how three sworn brothers conquer the world with their bare hands. While connecting romance from the previous generation to the shared emotions with the present, the drama explores differences in generational values.

programme.title: Our Graduation Ceremony - EP 1
programme.desc: Professor Ma Hengri (Ma Junwei), a former director turned educator, and his assistant Kelly Kwan (Tang Baoru) guide students through challenges like family issues, academic pressure, bullying, and self-worth.

programme.title: Our Graduation Ceremony - EP 2
programme.desc: Professor Ma Hengri (Ma Junwei), a former director turned educator, and his assistant Kelly Kwan (Tang Baoru) guide students through challenges like family issues, academic pressure, bullying, and self-worth.

programme.title: Kill My Sins - EP 7
programme.desc: Set during the era of Emperor Tang Zhongzong, the story follows Gu Qing, the orphaned survivor of a renowned medical family. Under the alias Ye Ping'an (Liu Shishi), she embarks on a journey of vengeance.

programme.title: Lo And Behold - EP 1969
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 5
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 6
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Moonshine - EP 14
programme.desc: In the era of strict prohibition, a dangerous yet exciting romance between a moonshiner and an inspector begins. A moonshiner, the daughter of a poor noble family brews and smuggles alcohol to make ends meet, but her life turns upside down when an inspector discovers her business.

programme.title: Si Jin - EP 24
programme.desc: Jiang Si (Jing Tian), the fourth lady of Dongping Bo Mansion, is reborn after dying at the hands of her lover, Yu Jin (Zhang Wan Yi). Determined to rewrite her fate, she breaks off her engagement and investigates a series of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: The Legend of Young Justice Bao - EP 10
programme.desc: The story tells about various bizarre mysteries such as "Blood Soul Forest", "Pouling Town", and "Ghost Valley" that Bao Zheng experienced in his youth on his way to Beijing to rush to the exam.

programme.title: Narcotics Heroes - EP 8
programme.desc: In order to crack down the top drug lord Man Wa who controls more than half the business in HK, undercover Ho Tin was placed beside Wa. Wa was betrayed by his most trusted Ho Tin and got arrested. Watch how Man Wa builds the new world!

programme.title: Trimming Success - EP 11
programme.desc: FAN TIN-LONG JASON (CHENG, KEVIN) has recently broken up with his girlfriend KO CHEUK-KEI CHOCO (CHAN MAN CHI, SHARON). As his father FAN KWONG-WING GEORGE (LAU DAN) falls ill suddenly, LONG, now single again, decides to move back to his old home in Stanley._x000D__x000D_There LONG meets his childhood friend PANG CHING (CHAN CHUNG LING, NADIA) again, who has now become a windsurfing trainer and a mechanical engineer.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 10
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 1
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 7
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhou’s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 5
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 6
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice.
